Hi, I’m Sam.

Here you can find my posts, projects, and resume.

I’m a software engineer and designer, a geographer, and an avid open source software contributor. I work at Mapbox building tools to make stronger and faster maps. Previously I was a Code for America Fellow working on health care delivery in Richmond, VA.

I’m a former Editor for the Atlas of Design and proud member of CUGOS where we build cool map projects like Dropchop.

You can find most of my work on Github. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
